articles.title: Now, Delhiites can renew fire permits via online portal
articles.description: Calling the initiative an important milestone in advancing transparent and technology-driven governance, Gupta said it would enhance the ease of doing business in the Capital.

articles.title: Chinese companies rapidly become strong contenders in India EV market
articles.description: Chinese electric vehicle companies are making significant inroads into India's growing EV market. Brands like BYD, MG, and Volvo are capturing substantial market share, offering advanced technology and features. While Indian companies like Tata Motors and Mahindra & Mahindra still lead, the competition is intensifying.
articles.content:

articles.title: Inside track by Coomi Kapoor: Bihar ki baat
articles.description: This week's highlights cover major developments in Indian politics, technology, and culture. The Bihar election fallout reveals internal RJD rifts regarding Lalu Prasad's absence and campaign strategy.
articles.content: The absence of Lalu Prasad in his son Tejashwi’s poll campaign — even his photo was missing from the campaign posters — did not go down well with the former CM’s diehard supporters. One explanation for keeping Lalu out of the public eye was the appre... [4678 chars]

articles.title: Dr Jitendra leads ‘Unity March’ commemorating Patel, pays obeisance to Birsa Munda
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent BATOTE, Nov 15: Union Minister of State (Independent Charge) Dr. Jitendra Singh, Minister for Science & Technology, Earth Sciences, MoS in the Prime Minister’s Office, Ministry of Personnel, Public Grievances & Pensions, and Department of Atomic Energy & Space today participated in the ongoing celebrations of Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel Birth Anniversary and Janjatiya Gaurav Divas to commemorate the 150th Birth Anniversary of tribal freedom fighter and social reformer Bhagwan Birsa Munda at Batote in Ramban district. On the […]
articles.content:
Excelsior Correspondent
BATOTE, Nov 15: Union Minister of State (Independent Charge) Dr. Jitendra Singh, Minister for Science & Technology, Earth Sciences, MoS in the Prime Minister’s Office, Ministry of Personnel, Public Grievances & Pensions, and D... [1814 chars]

articles.title: Satish Sharma inaugurates, inspects key development projects
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent JAMMU, Nov 15: Minister for Food, Civil Supplies & Consumer Affairs, Information Technology, Transport, Youth Services & Sports, ARI and Trainings, Satish Sharma today conducted an extensive visit to various project sites in Khour to inspect the pace of ongoing developmental works. During the visit the Minister reviewed and inaugurated the 2.00 km road construction project from Datyal to Gujrail in Block Khour. Interacting with engineers and field staff on-site, he directed them to strictly adhere to quality […]
articles.content:
Excelsior Correspondent
JAMMU, Nov 15: Minister for Food, Civil Supplies & Consumer Affairs, Information Technology, Transport, Youth Services & Sports, ARI and Trainings, Satish Sharma today conducted an extensive visit to various project sites in K... [2111 chars]

articles.title: Modi Govt raised Udhampur to country's top 3 districts in road connectivity: Dr Jitendra
articles.description: Launches Rs 924 cr new, Rs 86 cr completed road projects Avtar Bhat UDHAMPUR, Nov 15 : Union Minister in PMO with independent charge of Science and Technology, Dr. Jitendra Singh, today said that road connectivity in hitherto neglected areas of Udhampur, Kathua and Doda by previous regimes became possible after Modi Government gave priority to these areas which resulted in Udhampur becoming among the country’s top three districts so far as road connectivity is concerned. Follow the Daily Excelsior […]
articles.content:
Launches Rs 924 cr new, Rs 86 cr completed road projects
Avtar Bhat
UDHAMPUR, Nov 15 : Union Minister in PMO with independent charge of Science and Technology, Dr. Jitendra Singh, today said that road connectivity in hitherto neglected areas of Udham... [272 chars]

articles.title: Katra Chamber meets Satish Sharma
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent JAMMU, Nov 15: A delegation of the Chamber of Tourism Trade and Industry Katra (CTTIK) today met Satish Sharma, Minister for Food, Civil Supplies & Consumer Affairs, Transport, Information Technology, Youth Services and Sports, in the presence of Vikas Gupta, Director Tourism Jammu. The meeting took place on the sidelines of the flag-off ceremony of the Jambu Gedi Bus Service by Chief Minister Omar Abdullah at the Jammu Tawi Golf Course Sidhra. During the interaction, the CTTIK delegation […]
articles.content:
Excelsior Correspondent
JAMMU, Nov 15: A delegation of the Chamber of Tourism Trade and Industry Katra (CTTIK) today met Satish Sharma, Minister for Food, Civil Supplies & Consumer Affairs, Transport, Information Technology, Youth Services and Sports... [1987 chars]

articles.title: Ensure simple, timely approval system for investors in IT, ITES sectors: UP CM
articles.description: During a review meeting, Yogi Adityanath said integrating the youth into a technology-driven economy is a key government priority
articles.content: “The state’s startup ecosystem is expanding rapidly and must be further strengthened by ensuring comprehensive support for training, testing, and market linkages,” said the chief minister while presiding over a meeting convened to review the informat... [2025 chars]

articles.title: Your next serve of lentils could be the product of AI
articles.description: Australian inventors are using artificial intelligence to help farmers grade their crops but the technology almost proved too efficient.
articles.content:
The fine art of grading lentils is a laborious task that requires tweezers, a magnifying glass, specialist training, serious attention to detail, and up to 45 minutes.
But one Australian start-up is deploying artificial intelligence to speed up the p... [2355 chars]
